name: Mano Flow Bowl
description:
Handcrafted ceramic bowl by Maki Sugita from Sapporo, Japan.

These bowls are beautifully handcrafted, like all Mono's ceramics they hold the key design elements of her practice, a textural finish and hand shaped. 

Bowl dimensions approximately
L  165mm x 70mm 
M 140mm x 60mm 
S  130mm x 50mm 

All Mano products take 1 week to produce and are created using a potter's wheel. Please note as all Mano products are individually handmade, no two items will be the same.

name: Kokon Fringe Boots - brown
description:
100% velour leather fringe shoes with rubber soles made by Kokon from Kanazawa, Japan.
 
All pieces are handstitched together to create a beautifully crafted shoe. 
Sole is hand stitched onto the rubber sole for extra durability.

Shoes come packaged in a Kokon dustbag.

These colours are exclusively hand selected by I'M HOME.

name: Mocco Spoon Brooch
description:
Unisex Spoon brooch, made from Brass, wood and includes Pearls. 

Handcrafted by mocco from Tokyo, Japan.

Each product is beautifully packaged in a small box, paper gift bag, and thank-you card. All handmade by mocco!

name: Kamiwan Paper Vase Large
description:
Kamiwan Paper vase, creation of Industrial designer  Ryosuke Harashima, in-conjunction with Asakura Shigyo paper makers. 

Everything about this vase speaks of craftsmanship, created using handmade paper made from pulp in the beautiful Ishikawa Prefecture. 
The vases are then hand dyed using ink, and sealed to make them water tight. They truly are original, Ryosuke speaks of these works as crossing over the traditional and innovative.  

dimension are 210mm x 150mm 

White Sold Out

name: Kamiwan Paper Vase (Small)
description:
Kamiwan Paper vase, creation of Industrial designer  Ryosuke Harashima, in-conjunction with Asakura Shigyo paper makers. 

Everything about this vase speaks of craftsmanship, created using handmade paper made from pulp in the beautiful Ishikawa Prefecture. 
The vases are then hand dyed using ink, and sealed to make them water tight. They truly are original, Ryosuke speaks of these works as crossing over the traditional and innovative. 

dimesions are 100mm x 70mm

White sold out!

name: Mocco Oval Brooch
description:
Mocco Oval Brooch

3 colored hand shaped wood and paper pyramid Brooch. The brooch is created from thin sheets of wood and paper which is layered and then cut and shaved into shape.

As each piece is hand crafted, no brooch will be exactly the same.

Each product is beautifully packaged in a small box, paper gift bag, and thank-you card. All handmade by mocco!

Handcrafted by mocco from Tokyo, Japan.

description:

Made from a combination of smooth, nubuck & velour leather.
 
All pieces are handstitched together to create a beautifully crafted shoe. 
Sole is hand stitched onto the rubber sole for extra durability.

Shoes come packaged in a Kokon dustbag.

These colours are exclusively hand selected by I'M HOME.

name: Mocco Oval Brooch with Brass

As each piece is hand crafted, no Brooch will be exactly the same.

Each product is beautifully packaged in a small box, paper gift bag, and thank-you card. All handmade by mocco!

name: Maru Coffee Mug
description:
Handcrafted ceramic mug by Maki Sugita from Sapporo, Japan.

These Beautiful handmade Coffee mugs come in a selection of colours, cream and a dark blue. Made using an ceramics wheel, and hand painted the finishing aesthetics are exquisite. 

Mano's ceramics will be appreciated for years to come. 

All Mano products take 1 week to produce and are created using a potter's wheel. Please note as all Mano products are individually handmade, no two items will be exactly the same.

Handwash only

name: Mocco Pearl Necklace
description:
Pearl Necklace by Mocco.
Two different size pearls on a silk string with brass rod.

Handcrafted by mocco from Tokyo, Japan.

Comes in Cute handmade pouch.

name: Mocco Pearl ring
description:
24 karat gold plated silver ring with a pearl. 

Handcrafted by mocco from Tokyo, Japan.

Each product is beautifully packaged in a small box, paper gift bag, and thank-you card. All handmade by mocco!

name: Soil Chopping Board Holder
description:
Soil Chopping board holder, comes in a choice of Green or White. 
Looks beautiful on your kitchen bench. 

Fits a variety of boards due to it's size and weight.

All Soil products are hand made by specialist plasterers in Kanazawa, made up of Diatomaceous earth, which derives from the ocean and lakes in Ishikawa, Nigata and Akita prefectures. each colour is dependant of the prefectures earth.

name: Free cup
description:
Handcrafted ceramic cup by Maki Sugita from Sapporo, Japan.

Designed to make the essence of drinking a pleasurable one, hand shaped to make the cup feel as one with the hand. This unique design is the core of Mano's study into the art of ceramics.  

All Mano products take 1 week to produce and are created using a potter's wheel. Please note as all Mano products are individually handmade, no two items will be the same.

Handwash only.

Approx. measurement  ::  Ø88 * 90  
[note height is irregular]

description:

Very clean aesthetic, minimalism is the trademark of soil branding.

All Soil products are hand made by specialist plasterers in Kanazawa, made up of Diatomaceous earth, which derives from the ocean and lakes in Ishikawa, Nigata and Akita prefectures. each colour is dependant of the prefectures earth.

name: 'Pan' fuku-kazari [bread brooch]
description:
Hand shaped wooden brooch in the shape of 'pan', bread! 

As each piece is hand crafted, no two bread buns will be exactly the same.

Each product is beautifully packaged in a small box, paper gift bag, and thank-you card. All handmade by mocco!

Handcrafted by mocco from Tokyo, Japan.

name: Soap dish
description:
Unlike other soap dishes, 'Soil' soap dishes absorb soap moisture and remain clean and dry. It is a very intelligent material called Diatomaceous earth, which derives from the ocean and lakes in Ishikawa, Nigata and Akita prefectures.

All soil products are handmade by specialist plasterers in Kanazawa, Japan.

Air removals in the production process can lead to slight variances in colour and tone and surface patterning. 

If it becomes mouldy, spray bleaching agent on the surface of the dish, rinse with running water and dry in the sun.

This in no way affects the properties and quality of the products.

Approx. measurement  ::  Ø100 * 15

name: Mocco Clould Earrings.
description:
Hand shaped wood and paper Clould earrings with 18k gold silver stud backing. The Clould is created from thin sheets of wood and paper which is layered and then cut and shaved into shape. 

As each piece is hand crafted, no earring will be exactly the same.

Each product is beautifully packaged in a small box, paper gift bag, and thank-you card. All handmade by mocco!

Handcrafted by mocco from Tokyo, Japan.

Please note for hygiene reasons we cannot accept exchanges on earrings. Thank-you for your understand.

name: Maru bowl
description:
Handcrafted ceramic bowl by Maki Sugita from Sapporo, Japan.

These Bowls come in a selection of colour, both cream and dark blue. The perfect size for a small snack, such as a bowl of miso, or to be used for to serve a variety of accompaniments in for a nice dinner in at home.

All Mano products take 1 week to produce and are created using a potter's wheel. Please note as all Mano products are individually handmade, no two items will be the same.

Handwash only.

name: 'Pearl ball' fuku-kazari [brooch]
description:

As each piece is hand crafted, no two brooches will be exactly the same.

Each product is beautifully packaged in a small box, paper gift bag, and thank-you card. All handmade by mocco!

name: Leaf plate
description:
Handcrafted ceramic plate by Maki Sugita from Sapporo, Japan.

These plates can work as a beautiful serving dish for small salads or noodles, or as a base for a tea cup e.t.c. 
The finishing aesthetics of mano's products are to be desired, with every layer of finishing paint presenting it's own unique story. It is because of this that we are very excited to not only sell Mano's ceramics but use them from day to day.

All Mano products take 1 week to produce and are created using a potter's wheel. Please note as all Mano products are individually handmade, no two items will be the same.

name: Drying board for PET bottles
description:
Brilliant yet simple design is what make Soil products stand out. This pet bottle drying board is no exception. 
These drying boards are made from diatomaceous earth and absorb the water from the drying PET bottles.

The bumps on the board enable the PET bottles to stand up.


All soil products are handmade by specialist plasterers in Kanazawa, Japan.

Air removals in the production process can lead to slight variances in colour and tone and surface patterning. 

This in no way affects the properties and quality of the products.

Approx. measurement  ::  108 * 90 * 27

name: Kokon Concho Boots - natural
description:

Velcro tabs on either side of the shoes for ease of wear.
All pieces are handstitched together to create a beautifully crafted shoe.
Sole is hand stitched onto the rubber sole for extra durability.

These colours are exclusively hand selected by I'M HOME.

name: Square coaster [set of 4]
description:
Set of 4 square coasters in assorted colours - green, charcoal, white and pink.

Coasters are made from diatomaceous earth, which absorbs water. The rear side with the logo "soil" on which there is a silicon coating, does not absorb water.

These coasters put Soil on the market, and made this small company, who's revenue came from rebuilding some of Japans oldest castles, into a company who's leading the contemporary homewares industry within Japan.

Stocked at museum shops throughout Ishikawa Prefecture. Everything about these speak of perfection within minimal contemporary design.

Marks from glasses on the coasters can be removed with running water and then drying in the sun. In order to remove persistent stains, pat the coaster with a cloth containing bleaching agent then rinse with running water and dry in the sun.


All soil products are handmade by specialist plasterers in Kanazawa, Japan.

Air removals in the production process can lead to slight variances in colour and tone and surface patterning. 

This in no way affects the properties and quality of the products.

Approx. measurement ::  80 * 80 * 8

Air removals in the production process can lead to slight variances in colour and tone and surface patterning.

name: Toothbrush stand
description:
These toothbrush holders are our best sellers, not only do they absorb moisture from the toothbrush, but adds originality and refinement and to your bathroom. Looks great accompanied with the cotton swab container.

The toothbrush stands are made entirely of diatomaceous earth and are treated with a 'sakan' washout finish. The stand absorbs water drained from toothbrushes and keeps your surfaces dry.

If the inner surface gets stained by toothpaste, clean with a cleaning brush and dry in the sun.

All soil products are handmade by specialist plasterers in Kanazawa, Japan.

Approx. measurement  ::  Ø60 * 120

name: Aroma pot
description:
The Aroma pot is my favourite amongst  Soils impressive selection of home-wares. Great for the bathroom or anywhere you need to leave a pleasant smell. The matt finishing aesthetic is soils trademark, which combined with this design and colour is the perfect gift for yourself or others.


Oils are poured directly onto the lid surface of the aroma pot. Some fading will occur over time on the lid. An additional 2 lids are included.

All soil products are handmade by specialist plasterers in Kanazawa, Japan.

Air removals in the production process can lead to slight variances in colour and tone and surface patterning. 

This in no way affects the properties and quality of the products.

Approx. measurement  ::  Ø180 * 30

name: Cotton swab containers
description:
These Cotton Swab containers are a great accompaniment to your bathroom, this beautiful cylinder can be used for a variety of things and come with a matching lid.

Colour of all soil products depend on which prefecture in Japan the earth derives from. 

These containers are made entirely of diatomaceous earth and are treated with a 'sakan' washout finish. 

For stain removal, use a cleaning brush and then dry in the sun.


All soil products are handmade by specialist plasterers in Kanazawa, Japan.

Air removals in the production process can lead to slight variances in colour and tone and surface patterning. 

This in no way affects the properties and quality of the products.

Approx. measurement  ::  Ø100 * 130

name: Soil Bath Mat
description:
Soil Bath Mat, Light wave model. 
As this mat is made from diatomaceous earth as soon as you step onto it the mat starts to absorb the water from your feet.
